casebody.data:
Coleman et al., Appellees, v. Cleveland Heights/University Heights School Board, Appellant.

[Cite as Coleman v. Cleveland Hts./Univ. Hts. School Bd. (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 203.]

(No. 00-632 Submitted February 28, 2001 Decided March 28, 2001.) Mondello & Levey, Scott Levey and Frank Giaimo, for appellees. Shawn R. Pearson, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Stevens v. Ackman (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 182, 743 N.E.2d 901.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
